title: 11/22/21 DPS Hour 3 Ron Rivera and Carson Palmer
itunes:title: 11/22/21 DPS Hour 3 Ron Rivera and Carson Palmer
description:
Ron Rivera talks to Dan about how it was to go back to Carolina and face Cam Newton. Ron says it was much tougher to face Tom Brady over Cam Newton. Carson Palmer talks to Dan about all the upsets in the NFL from Sunday.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
